sentences.en: A mere certification of suitability from the vendor, for example, is inadequate.
sentences.cn: 例如, 仅仅从计算机零售商那里获得的适应性证书是不够的.

sentences.en: Be responsible for process and equipment suitability assessment when introducing new product.
sentences.cn: 负责产品引入时工艺流程与设备的适用性评估.

sentences.en: Chu Caixin has the suitability, the imitation art object ashamed idle work.
sentences.cn: 朱彩具有适用性, 仿造艺术品羞愧闲置的工作.

sentences.en: Climate suitability of seawater crabs culture in Jiangsu littoral was studied.
sentences.cn: 研究江苏沿海海水蟹类养殖的气候适宜性.

sentences.en: Farmland suitability evaluation is one type of land suitability evaluation.
sentences.cn: 农地适宜性评价是土地适宜性评价的一种类型.

sentences.en: His suitability for the post is open to question.
sentences.cn: 对这一职位他是否适宜很成问题.

sentences.en: It also illustrates the suitability by comparing the satisfaction about two systems.
sentences.cn: 通过新旧绩效考核体系员工满意度调查,对比说明了考核体系的适用程度.

sentences.en: The application of multi - media technology should pay attention to timing, moderation, suitability.
sentences.cn: 使用多媒体技术要注意适时性 、 度性 、 当性.

sentences.en: The questions we ask are about the suitability of the role.
sentences.cn: 我们问的问题都是关于角色的适应性.

sentences.en: There is no doubt about his suitability for the job.
sentences.cn: 毫无疑问,他适合这个工作.

sentences.en: There's a question mark about her suitability for the job.
sentences.cn: 她是否适应这个工作是个问号.

sentences.en: There's no doubt about her suitability for the job.
sentences.cn: 毫无疑问,她适合这项工作.

sentences.en: There's some doubt about his suitability for the job.
sentences.cn: 他是否适合该工作有些疑问.

sentences.en: This inner scorecard is something that people use to rate the suitability of mates.
sentences.cn: 这个内部记分卡是人们用于评价配偶适合度的依据。

sentences.en: We split our operational assessment into two categories effectiveness and suitability.
sentences.cn: 我们将作战物资分成作战威力和适用性两大类.

sentences.en: We tried to assess his suitability for the job.
sentences.cn: 我们想评估一下他是否适合这项工作.

words.tran_cn: 适宜；相配；供给…衣服（suit的ing形式）

trans.tran_en: the degree to which something or someone has the right qualities for a particular purpose
